Entry.title: Entry
Entry.description: Represents a user-submitted form entry in Agriassist, stored in Firestore.

userId.description: User ID of the user who submitted the form. Empty string if user is not authenticated.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the form was submitted.

cropType.description: The predicted crop type from the AI model.

condition.description: The predicted health status or disease condition of the crop.

imageUrl.description: URL of the uploaded crop image stored in Cloud Storage.

confidence.description: The prediction confidence level of the AI model (0-1).

History.title: History
History.description: Represents a single user action or event in the application for auditing purposes.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the action.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the action occurred.

targetId.description: The ID of the entity that was affected (e.g., the ID of a prediction document).

details.description: A human-readable description of the event.

/crop_data/{entryId}.description: Stores user-submitted form entries. Includes fields for userId, timestamp, cropType, condition, imageUrl, and predictionConfidence.

/history/{historyId}.description: Stores a log of all user actions and important events within the application for auditing.
